bibl.title: The Warrior Queen. The Cult of Hellenistic Female Rulers as the Basis of their Symbolic Participation in Military Acts.
bibl.note: Military achievements and the cosmological model. - Women and sacred military deeds in Greek mythology. - The Macedonian and hellenistic queens: Divine cult and the battlefield. - Agon and deification. - The hellenistic queens as warrior goddesses. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Lucyna Kostuch, The Warrior Queen. The Cult of Hellenistic Female Rulers as the Basis of their Symbolic Participation in Military Acts.

Military achievements and the cosmological model. - Women and sacred military deeds in Greek mythology. - The Macedonian and hellenistic queens: Divine cult and the battlefield. - Agon and deification. - The hellenistic queens as warrior goddesses. - Avec résumé en anglais.
